import { useState,useEffect } from "react" import {useLocation} from "react-router-dom" const ChatRoom=()=>{ const location=useLocation() const[data,setData]=useState({}) const[msg,setMsg]=useState("") const[allMessages,setMessages]=useState([]) useEffect(()=> { setData(location.data) },[location]) const handleChange=e=>{ setMsg(e.target.value) } const onSubmit=()=>{ const newMessage={time: new Date(),msg, name:data.name} setMessages(...allMessages, newMessage) } return(

{data?.room} Chat Room

Ishaan 2-minutes ago

Hello There

Ishaan 2-minutes ago

Hello There

) } export default ChatRoom
